meanings.definition: A solid figure having twenty faces.
meanings.sent1: I saw many colorful icosahedrons in the math class.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful sculpture using icosahedrons.
meanings.sent3: The icosahedrons at the party were actually pinatas filled with candy.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex network of interconnected icosahedrons.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight reflected off the icosahedrons, creating a mesmerizing pattern.

meanings.sent1: The children built icosahedrons out of colorful blocks.
meanings.sent2: The architect designed a building inspired by the shape of icosahedrons.
meanings.sent3: The aliens communicated using holographic icosahedrons.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like a jumble of spinning icosahedrons.
meanings.sent5: The crystal icosahedrons sparkled under the moonlight.
